verses.verse: Stand fast <S%G4739><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> in the <S%G3588><s%> liberty <S%G1657><s%> wherewith <S%G3739><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> hath made us free, <S%G1659><s%> <S%G2248><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> be not <S%G3361><s%> entangled again with <S%G1758><s%> <S%G3825><s%> the yoke <S%G2218><s%> of bondage. <S%G1397><s%>

Behold, <S%G2396><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> ye be circumcised, <S%G4059><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> shall profit <S%G5623><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> nothing. <S%G3762><s%>

For <S%G1161><s%> I testify <S%G3143><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> to every <S%G3956><s%> man <S%G444><s%> that is circumcised, <S%G4059><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he is <S%G2076><s%> a debtor <S%G3781><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> whole <S%G3650><s%> law. <S%G3551><s%>

Christ <S%G5547><s%> is become of no effect <S%G2673><s%> unto you, whosoever <S%G3748><s%> of you are justified <S%G1344><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the law; <S%G3551><s%> ye are fallen <S%G1601><s%> from grace. <S%G5485><s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> through the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> wait for <S%G553><s%> the hope <S%G1680><s%> of righteousness <S%G1343><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> faith. <S%G4102><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> neither <S%G3777><s%> circumcision <S%G4061><s%> availeth <S%G2480><s%> any thing, <S%G5100><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> uncircumcision; <S%G203><s%> but <S%G235><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> which worketh <S%G1754><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> love. <S%G26><s%>
Ye did run <S%G5143><s%> well; <S%G2573><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> did hinder <S%G348><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> that ye should not <S%G3361><s%> obey <S%G3982><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> truth? <S%G225><s%>
This persuasion <S%G3988><s%> cometh not <S%G3756><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> him that calleth <S%G2564><s%> you. <S%G5209><s%>
A little <S%G3398><s%> leaven <S%G2219><s%> leaveneth <S%G2220><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> whole <S%G3650><s%> lump. <S%G5445><s%>

I <S%G1473><s%> have confidence <S%G3982><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> ye will be none otherwise minded: <S%G5426><s%> <S%G3762><s%> <S%G243><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> he that troubleth <S%G5015><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> shall bear <S%G941><s%> his judgment, <S%G2917><s%> whosoever <S%G3748><s%> <S%G302><s%> he be. <S%G5600><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> I, <S%G1473><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> I yet <S%G2089><s%> preach <S%G2784><s%> circumcision, <S%G4061><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> do I yet <S%G2089><s%> suffer persecution? <S%G1377><s%> then <S%G686><s%> is the <S%G3588><s%> offense <S%G4625><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> cross <S%G4716><s%> ceased. <S%G2673><s%>
I would <S%G3785><s%> they were even <S%G2532><s%> cut off <S%G609><s%> which trouble <S%G387><s%> you. <S%G5209><s%>

For, <S%G1063><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> have been called <S%G2564><s%> unto <S%G1909><s%> liberty; <S%G1657><s%> only <S%G3440><s%> use not <S%G3361><s%> liberty <S%G1657><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> an occasion <S%G874><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> flesh, <S%G4561><s%> but <S%G235><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> love <S%G26><s%> serve <S%G1398><s%> one another. <S%G240><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> is fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> word, <S%G3056><s%> even in <S%G1722><s%> this; <S%G3588><s%> Thou shalt love <S%G25><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> neighbor <S%G4139><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> thyself. <S%G1438><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> ye bite <S%G1143><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> devour <S%G2719><s%> one another, <S%G240><s%> take heed <S%G991><s%> that ye be not <S%G3361><s%> consumed <S%G355><s%> one of another. <S%G240><s%>

This I say <S%G3004><s%> then, <S%G1161><s%> Walk <S%G4043><s%> in the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ye shall not <S%G3364><s%> fulfill <S%G5055><s%> the lust <S%G1939><s%> of the flesh. <S%G4561><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> lusteth <S%G1937><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> flesh: <S%G4561><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> are contrary <S%G480><s%> the one to the other: <S%G240><s%> so that <S%G2443><s%> ye cannot <S%G3361><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> the things <S%G5023><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> ye would. <S%G2309><s%>
But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> ye be led <S%G71><s%> of the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> ye are <S%G2075><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> the law. <S%G3551><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> are <S%G2076><s%> manifest, <S%G5318><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> are <S%G2076><s%> these; adultery, <S%G3430><s%> fornication, <S%G4202><s%> uncleanness, <S%G167><s%> lasciviousness, <S%G766><s%>

Idolatry, <S%G1495><s%> witchcraft, <S%G5331><s%> hatred, <S%G2189><s%> variance, <S%G2054><s%> emulations, <S%G2205><s%> wrath, <S%G2372><s%> strife, <S%G2052><s%> seditions, <S%G1370><s%> heresies, <S%G139><s%>

Envyings, <S%G5355><s%> murders, <S%G5408><s%> drunkenness, <S%G3178><s%> revellings, <S%G2970><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> such <S%G5125><s%> like: <S%G3664><s%> of the which <S%G3739><s%> I tell you before, <S%G4302><s%> <S%G5213><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> I have also <S%G2532><s%> told you in time past, <S%G4277><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> they which do <S%G4238><s%> such things <S%G5108><s%> shall not <S%G3756><s%> inherit <S%G2816><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> love, <S%G26><s%> joy, <S%G5479><s%> peace, <S%G1515><s%> longsuffering, <S%G3115><s%> gentleness, <S%G5544><s%> goodness, <S%G19><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%>
Meekness, <S%G4236><s%> temperance: <S%G1466><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> there is <S%G2076><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> law. <S%G3551><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G3588><s%> that are Christ's <S%G5547><s%> have crucified <S%G4717><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> affections <S%G3804><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> lusts. <S%G1939><s%>
If <S%G1487><s%> we live <S%G2198><s%> in the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> let us also <S%G2532><s%> walk <S%G4748><s%> in the Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>
Let us not <S%G3361><s%> be <S%G1096><s%> desirous of vain glory, <S%G2755><s%> provoking <S%G4292><s%> one another, <S%G240><s%> envying <S%G5354><s%> one another. <S%G240><s%>
